alert.note: Alert for Gallia (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gallia, southwestern Mason, northeastern Cabell and northwestern Putnam Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Buffalo, or 14 miles south of Gallipolis, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hurricane, Milton, Eleanor, Buffalo, Culloden, Teays Valley, Crown City, Fraziers Bottom, and Ashton. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 26 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
